GeolocationCoordinatesAltitudeAccuracy.summary: The altitudeAccuracy read-only property of the interface is a strictly positive double representing the accuracy, with a 95% confidence level, of the altitude expressed in meters. This value is null if the implementation doesn't support measuring altitude.
GeolocationCoordinatesAltitudeAccuracy.value:
A positive double representing the accuracy, with a 95% confidence level,
of the altitude expressed in meters.
